articles.author: The Editorial Board
articles.title: Voters Cancel the War on Police - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: From Seattle to Long Island, Americans voted against public disorder.
articles.content: With crime surging in many cities, voters rejected the anti-police left this week. Minneapolis was the birthplace of the defund the police movement, but on Tuesday more than 56% of voters rejected a … [+509 chars]

articles.title: 'Rust' armorer's lawyer suggests 'sabotage,' crew member details lack of gun safety on set of Alec Baldwin movie - The Washington Post
articles.description: Former “Rust” crew members and their attorneys spoke out on « Good Morning America » and « Today » about what they believe went wrong on the set of the Alec Baldwin movie.
articles.content: In my 10 years as camera assistant, Ive never worked on a show that cares so little for the safety of its crew, Luper wrote in his resignation letter, snippets of which GMA shared on air. He wasnt th… [+5665 chars]

articles.title: Anglo American appoints South African Duncan Wanblad as CEO to replace Mark Cutifani - Moneyweb
articles.description: Wanblad is the first local to be appointed to the position in more than a decade.
articles.content:
Anglo American has chosen a 54-year old South African, Duncan Wanblad, as the successor to outgoing CEO Mark Cutifani, who steps down in April next year after nine years at the helm.
Tony Trahar was… [+4357 chars]
